I know that an administrator can start up multiple instances of
Heritrix by=
 logging into the console and manually starting them up,
but I was wonderin=
g if there was a way to do this via some sort of
configuration for this to =
happen at startup.

I mean, I could always do a 'curl' command and call tha=
t JSP directly,
but I didn't want to do such a 'hack'.
